Question: 3M CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
3M

Product: 3M™ PELTOR™ WS™ ALERT™ XPV Headset

- World's first self-charging protective communications headset
- Converts outdoor and indoor light into clean electrical energy
- Patented solar cell technology called Powerfoyle™
- Recharges a built-in lithium-ion battery, eliminating the need for single-use batteries
- Bluetooth technology enabled for easy and clearer conversations
- Noise-cancelling microphone for noisy work environments
- PTL (Push-to-Listen) feature for hearing surroundings without removing the headset
- Glove-friendly push buttons for quick settings adjustment
- Comes with the 3M™ Connected Equipment app for adjusting settings and monitoring solar cell energy levels
- Partly produced with recycled plastics and electronics
- Supports Over-the-Air (OTA) firmware updates
- Expected to be available for purchase in March 2024
Summary_cn:
3M

产品：3M™ PELTOR™ WS™ ALERT™ XPV 头戴式耳机

- 世界上首款自充电保护性通讯耳机
- 将室内外光线转化为清洁电能
- 采用专利太阳能电池技术称为 Powerfoyle™
- 内置锂离子电池可充电，省去了一次性电池的需求
- 支持蓝牙技术，便于进行简单和清晰的对话
- 应对嘈杂的工作环境，配备有降噪麦克风
- PTL（按下即听）功能，可在不摘下耳机的情况下听到周围的声音
- 适合戴手套，设有易于操作的按钮，用于快速调整设置
- 配备 3M™ 连接设备应用程序，用于调整设置和监测太阳能电池能量水平
- 部分采用回收的塑料和电子元件生产
- 支持通过空中固件更新（OTA）
- 预计将于2024年3月上市销售
